name: version-controlled-api
description: vault dragon version controlled key-value HTTP API

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=dev npm run test && NODE_ENV=dev nodemon index.js
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=prod npm run test && NODE_ENV=prod node index.js
scripts.nodb: NODE_ENV=nodb npm run test && NODE_ENV=nodb node index.js
scripts.forever: npm run test && forever start index.js
